name: Basic CI Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Run validation
      run: |
        echo "CI pipeline running"
        ls wrong_folder


- name: Use secret
  run: echo "Secret is ${{ secrets.MY_SECRET }}"
